mapper.insert: insert into loa_member (id, passwd, nickname, server) values (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{nickname}, #{server})
mapper.select: select distinct count(id) from loa_member where id=#{id}
select * from loa_member where id=#{id} AND passwd=#{passwd} AND server=#{server}
mapper.update: update loa_member set post_count=#{post_count}+1 where id=#{id}
update loa_member set post_count=#{post_count}-1 where id=#{id}
